description: This file defines a React hook called useRecipeSearchParams that manages recipe search filter states via URL search parameters. It encodes and decodes list values for URL compatibility and provides a public interface to access and update search-related state stored in URL parameters.

methods.name: encodeList(values)
methods.description: Encodes an array of strings into a URL-safe comma-separated string.

methods.name: decodeList(value)
methods.description: Decodes a URL-safe comma-separated string into an array of trimmed strings.

methods.name: useRecipeSearchParams()
methods.description: Custom React hook that manages recipe search filter state synchronized with URL search parameters.
